p: Under the base‐case scenario (keeping continuum parameters at 2015 levels), viral suppression levels continue to increase after 2015, by a median 2, 3 and 4 percentage points above 2015 levels after 2, 5 and 10 years respectively. Under the base‐case scenario, projected annual HIV incidence declines from 3.3 (UI 1.8 to 5.0)/100 py in 2015 to 3.0/100 py in 2017, 2.7/100 py in 2020 and 2.4/100 py in 2025.
